metadata.name: FindTruman Genesis #1
metadata.description: FindTruman is the first alternate reality game in metaverse. A curated collection of 5,000 unique FindTruman Genesis NFTs(FTGs) on the Ethereum blockchain are the permanent tickets for FindTruman series. Each FTG represents a unique individual. Maybe you are the one who finds “Truman” finally, or the “Truman” that all the people are looking for. FTG also represents Truman DAO’s membership to share future governance rights and benefits.
